Summary: a plane that looked on fire
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Farmingdale
There were no other sightings in Farmingdale on or around September 21st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWas in my backyard having a cigarette when i noticed in the sky what looked like a plane on fire. i called to my wife to look and see and she thought the same thing. Itflew over our house and just continued to go what appears to be straight out to space. Any one else see this tonight?
